markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Object Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=2419)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 271

**Domain**
[Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Target** 1 weapon or tool
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

By touching an object, you draw forth the experience of those who created and used it. If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already trained or better). If you touch a [tool](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2759), your proficiency rank with the next skill check you attempt with that tool (such as a [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) check with a blacksmith’s hammer) within the spell’s duration temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already trained or better). This spell has no benefit for activities that take longer than a minute to complete.

---
**Heightened (6th)** Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.
name: Object Memory

If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already trained or better). If you touch a tool, your proficiency rank with the next skill check you attempt with that tool (such as a Crafting check with a blacksmith’s hammer) within the spell’s duration temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already trained or better). This spell has no benefit for activities that take longer than a minute to complete. --- Heightened (6th) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.
